name: Dino Island - The Four Crystals
description:
Story:

On the island of dinosaurs where peace and harmony reigned, where its inhabitants in which they are dinosaurs, live well, it is a good place, one day the island magician was studying one of the four crystals, the crystals are responsible for the island without them this place would exist, but a wizard wanted all the power of the crystals for him so he stole three of the four crystals, only the blue crystal that was with the wizard was safe, without the crystals the island of the dinosaurs is now in danger everyone is afraid of what can happen to the island, the wizard who had the blue crystal then decided to call the crystal guardian to recover the crystals taken by the wizard. Before the wizard gets all the crystals and has all the power for him.

Features:

  • Story
  • More than 40 levels.
  • 4 Bosses.
  • Different challenges in each part of the island.
  • Pixel Art
  • Platform game.
  • Windows 10 ( 32-bit and 64-bit )
  • Linux (Ubuntu  ( x86_64 ) )
